ChessGameKenai
Class Start_Game

java.lang.Object
  ChessGameKenai.Start_Game

public class Start_Game
extends java.lang.Object

Start_Game class is used to run the application Instead of having all this unnecessary code in our ChessBoardView class We hide this code in this class and by calling its instance. By hiding the code we are achieving one of the fundamental rules in programming which is "encapsulation" Hiding the data from the user

See Also:
class

          The empty constructor of the class has all needed instructions to create a chess game
